page.name: action
page.content:
School Identify Tool

This tool allows you to find public schools in Alameda County and find basic statistics about the school.

1. To begin,you can either select a schoool through the dropdown lists or click on show all schools.

2. To get information about the school, click on the school on the map.

3. Once the data page is open, you can print the report or just the ethnicity pie chart.

3. An added feature is that you can send the ethnicity chart to the chart widget for customization and to be saved throughout your visit to the site.
